name: DevHome
desc: DevHome revolutionizes housing with AR, offering immersive previews, precise cost estimates, and construction timelines, transforming expectations into tangible reality for futuristic residences.

name: Car Rental System
desc: A Java-based Car Rental System for managing car rentals and returns, featuring car and customer management, rental calculations, rental history tracking, and an interactive menu interface.

name: MysticMaliHeaven
desc: A HTML and CSS front page project capturing the essence of the Maldives with visually stunning design, showcasing its beauty through immersive and elegant visuals.

name: AgeCalculator
desc: The Age Calculator is a web app that calculates your age and days until your next birthday, providing instant, user-friendly results and helpful celebration reminders.

name: Simple QuizApp
desc: QuizApp is a responsive HTML, CSS, and JavaScript quiz application featuring multiple-choice questions and an automatic scoring system for a seamless cross-device user experience.
